plot: Chisuimaru loves sucking human blood; an all-around normal mosquito. Conversely, Nobuo hates his blood to be sucked; an all-around normal office worker. Chisuimaru is quite partial to the way Nobuo tastes, and in a quest for delicious blood, Chisuimaru passes the days chasing down his main course. But, not being one to loose to a mere insect, Nobuo tries to put up a resistance.
